amendment.description: Amendment no. 10 printed in Part B of H. Rept. 106-235. to permit the budgetary scoring of leased properties on an annual basis to expedite the construction of diplomatic facilities.

action.text: Mr. Chambliss raised a point of order against the Bereuter amendment (A007). Mr. Chambliss stated that the amendment violated section 306 of the Congressional Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
